attributes.action: Bills too high! - Food, gas, electricity etc
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are all feeling the pinch, and those of us who pay a lot of our money in tax and national insurance are struggling! Mortgage rates are extortionate, gas and electric have gone up, food prices are ridiculous - it is becoming really very difficult to be able to afford the cost of living at the moment.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
